Catay Bancorp Q2 2025 Results

Cathay Bancorp today announced second quarter earnings and provided an updated outlook.

Financial Highlights

Financial Highlights
Metric Q2 2025 Q2 2024
Total Revenue $750 $710
Net Income $210 $198
Total $960 $908

Outlook for Q4 2025

The company expects revenue to be in the range of $1.2 billion to $1.3 billion with non-GAAP EPS between $0.45 and $0.50.

Segment Revenue
Commercial Banking $430
Consumer Banking $320
